ref_text: Copy your referral link below and send it to your friends. For every purchase made using this link, you’ll receive 5% of the purchase amount.

One Bitcoin mined in 2013 appreciated 27,300% in 10 years. 
Bitcoin Minetrix provides hassle-free BTC mining for the next 10 years.
Buy $BTCMTX today for as little as ${{tokenPrice}}.

stake_desc: BTCMTX token rewards will be distributed to users at a rate of 158.5 BTCMTX per ETH block. Rewards will be payable over 2 years and are determined by your share of the staking pool and annual returns percentage.
withdraw_text: All staked tokens can be withdrawn 7 days after token claiming goes live, which will happen after the presale has concluded.

claim_stale_help: Confirm the transaction in your wallet to stake your BTCMTX now. This will automatically claim any rewards and stake all of your BTCMTX tokens. Tokens will be locked until 7 days after the claiming process goes live.

stake_popup_info: Unclaimed BTCMTX that was bought using ETH or ERC-20 USDT can be staked now. Staking for BTCMTX that was bought using BNB or USDT (BEP-20) can be staked once the presale ends. Please note that all early staked tokens can be withdrawn 7 days after token claiming goes live, which will happen after the presale has concluded.
pool_share: BTCMTX staking rewards are distributed at a rate of 4.75 BTCMTX per ETH block. Your percentage of the pool will determine what percentage of the 4.75 BTCMTX tokens you receive.
your_purchased_popup_info: Your total purchased tokens are all tokens purchased using the connected wallet. This includes all staked and unstaked tokens purchased on the Ethereum and BSC chains.
faq_cont_1: Bitcoin mining is the process of creating new bitcoin. Thousands of mining rigs compete to solve complex equations that validate Bitcoin transactions and maintain the public ledger, and earn new bitcoin (BTC) for doing so.
faq_cont_2: Cloud mining is the same process as bitcoin mining but allows individuals to purchase or rent a stake in third party mining operations, to remove the need to set up their own hardware.
faq_head_3: Why do we need Bitcoin Minetrix?
faq_cont_3: Bitcoin (BTC) mining is prohibitively expensive for the ordinary person, but anybody can buy and stake BTCMTX tokens to secure a share in the BTC Minetrix cloud mining platform. Traditional cloud mining has unfortunately been soured by scams, but Bitcoin Minetrix removes this risk with a decentralized solution to cloud mining.
faq_head_4: How is this different to traditional cloud mining?
faq_cont_4: BTC Minetrix is not like regular cloud mining services in a few important ways. Firstly, by utilizing ERC-20 tokens, we ensure that no money needs to change hands to participate in our cloud mining platform. Secondly, users decide how much bitcoin mining power they want to own by the number of mining credits they earn through BTCMTX token staking. Thirdly, thanks to the smart contract capabilities of the Ethereum blockchain, staking enables us to auto-manage user allocations in the safest and most decentralized way possible for end users.
faq_head_5: What is the difference between tokens and credits?
faq_cont_5: BTCMTX is an ERC-20 utility token that needs to be staked in order to earn mining credits. There is a total supply of 4 billion tokens. Mining credits are non-transferable ERC-20 tokens that need to be burned in exchange for cloud mining power. There is no max cap on mining credit tokens.
faq_cont_6: To contact our support team, please email us at
faq_cont_6_2: Our dedicated support staff will be more than happy to assist you with any questions, concerns, or enquiries you may have. We strive to provide timely and helpful responses to ensure your experience with our project is smooth and enjoyable.
faq_cont_6_3: Feel free to reach out to us at any time, and we look forward to providing you with excellent support and service. Thank you for choosing BTC Minetrix!
presale_title: Presale Open - Buy BTCMTX Tokens Now
wert_mount_desc: Please wait while we are initializing the Wert widget.
wert_disclaimer: By continuing, you're purchasing {{token}} tokens. Your tokens won't be immediately deposited to your wallet. You'll be able to claim them on the claim date that will be announced at a later date. After you claim them, they will be deposited to your wallet.
change_chain_info: Are you sure you want to change?
change_swap_text: If you purchase on BNB Smart Chain during the presale, you won't be eligible for the {{apy}}% annual returns from staking. We recommend buying on Ethereum if you want to stake.
about1_paraOne: Bitcoin Minetrix presents a reliable cloud mining platform for everyday crypto users that aims to fix the problem of high hardware costs and deceptive scams that have deterred people from BTC mining.
about1_paraTwo: With Bitcoin Minetrix, these concerns are a thing of the past. Users can simply stake their BTCMTX tokens to gain cloud mining credits. This decentralized method safeguards users' interests, ensuring a secure and transparent mining experience.
about2_paraOne: The Stake-to-Mine concept is a novel idea that promises to bring bitcoin mining back into the realm of possibility for ordinary crypto aficionados, for several reasons.
about2_paraTwo: Users of Bitcoin Minetrix need only an Ethereum-compatible wallet such as MetaMask to purchase and stake BTCMTX tokens, making things very simple. Staking BTCMTX earns non-tradable ERC-20 token credits that must be burned in exchange for BTC cloud mining power.
about3_paraOne: Although mostly run by corporations with huge physical mining rigs, cloud mining still provides a legitimate way for individuals to obtain BTC without buying it. There are several benefits:
about3_paraTwo: Users of Bitcoin Minetrix need only an Ethereum-compatible wallet such as MetaMask to purchase and stake BTCMTX tokens, making things very simple. Staking BTCMTX earns non-tradable ERC-20 token credits which must be burned in exchange for bitcoin cloud mining power.
buy_card_desc1: Connect your wallet and use the presale widget at the top of the page to buy BTCMTX tokens. You can use ETH, BNB, USDT, or bank card. Make sure you have enough ETH or BNB to cover gas fees.
buy_card_desc2: If you select the ‘Buy & Stake’ option you can start staking immediately and earn more BTCMTX tokens. Staking for mining credits (Stake-to-Mine) will be available when the app is launched.
buy_card_desc3: Your staked BTCMTX will generate mining credits over time. Burn mining credits to purchase bitcoin cloud mining power. The more credits you burn, the more BTC you’ll earn through cloud mining.
about_para: Bitcoin Minetrix is a tokenized cloud mining platform that allows everyday people to mine bitcoin (BTC) in a decentralized way. We’re tokenizing cloud mining to ensure a secure and transparent experience.
about_para1: We’re solving a huge problem by removing the risk of third party cloud mining scams and putting the control into the hands of token holders. Simply stake BTCMTX to earn credits, and use these to mine BTC.
reason_desc1: Cloud mining eliminates the need for technical expertise, hardware setup, and maintenance. It's user-friendly, making it accessible to beginners.
reason_desc2: By leveraging cloud mining companies' advanced equipment, individuals avoid high electricity costs and hardware investments.
reason_desc3: Mining rigs are bulky, noisy, and produce heat. With cloud mining, users won't have these disruptions in their homes.
reason_desc4: The rapid ageing of mining hardware can make resale challenging. Cloud mining keeps the responsibility to upgrade with the mining companies.
vatno: Cloud Tech X23 Ltd. Registration Number: 122422
faq_para: The answers to some of your most common questions are listed here. If you can’t find the info you’re looking for, let our moderators know in Telegram. You can also contact us at
faq_head_7: What are the presale and launch dates?
faq_const_7: The BTC Minetrix presale will run from the last week of September in predefined stages, or until it sells out. Once the presale ends, buyers will be able to claim their BTCMTX from the website at the same time as the token is listed on its first exchange. All claim and launch dates will be announced on our social media channels.
cal_para: Manage all your BTCMTX tokens and mining credits in one place with the Bitcoin Minetrix dashboard. Gain cloud mining power using your mining credits earned through staking.
cal_card_title: Burn credits to purchase mining hash power
address: Trust Company Complex, Ajeltake Road, Ajeltake Island, Majuro, Marshall Islands MH96960.
roadmap_desc: Our project roadmap is set out in four phases, starting with a fair presale to raise the necessary funds for marketing and cloud mining operations and ending with the fully developed Bitcoin Minetrix platform.
roadmap_title_4: Mass adoption of the BTCMTX token
tokenomics_para: 42.5% of the BTCMTX tokens will be used to fund the bitcoin mining operations of Bitcoin Minetrix. 35% of the tokens will be allocated to marketing efforts and growing BTCMTX. 12.5% is for BTCMTX staking rewards until the Bitcoin Minetrix cloud mining platform is developed. 10% is allocated to community rewards for active participation in the project.

roadmap_desc4_3: Disrupt and reshape bitcoin cloud mining space
